definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: chu1 xue4 xing4 deng1 ge2 re4

sentences.english: The main reason of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討介入治療兒童股骨頭缺血性壞死的價值。

sentences.english: We used a submaximal effort tourniquet test to induce ischemic pain.
sentences.chinese: 我們使用了亞努力止血帶試驗誘發缺血性疼痛。

sentences.english: Ischemic colitis commonly occurs in the elderly and has a wide clinical spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的虛血性大腸炎發生在老年人。

sentences.english: RESULTS Ischemia enhanced cell proliferation in DG of adult rats.
sentences.chinese: 結果缺血性腦損傷可促進成年大鼠齒狀回的細胞增殖。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic method and bleeding mechanism of the hemorrhagic moyamoya disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出血性煙霧病的出血機制及檢查診斷方法。

sentences.english: Finally, we found no association between the incidence of AVN and operation delay.
sentences.chinese: 最後我們沒有發現手術耽擱和缺血性壞死之間的關係。

sentences.english: This paper summarized professor Wang Zuo's experience in the treatment of acute hemorrhagic apoplexy.
sentences.chinese: 總結王左教授對急性出血性中風的認識。

sentences.english: Objective To appraise the clinic effect of mini-invasive drainage on hemorrhages cerebral apoplexy with herniation.
sentences.chinese: 探討微創穿刺引流對出血性腦卒中並腦疝的治療價值。

sentences.english: Babesiosis can cause hemolytic anemia in dogs.
sentences.chinese: 巴貝斯蟲病能引起犬隻的溶血性貧血。

sentences.english: Methods Two methods of blood sampling were applied in hemorrhagic shock model.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用兩種失血性休克動物模型的取血方法。

sentences.english: Objective To treat ischemia of the lower extremity, endarterectomy was performed.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討動脈內膜剝脫術治療下肢缺血性疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the etiological factor and diagnostic method of Moyamoya disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出血性煙霧病的出血機制及檢查診斷方法。

sentences.english: Metastases may lead to a hemorrhagic pericarditis.
sentences.chinese: 轉移性腫瘤可導致出血性心包炎。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of oxygen therapy in the treatment of high altitude hemorrhagic shock in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討氧療對高原失血性休克兔的治療作用。

sentences.english: Evaluate the anti-action of Aprotinin in ischemic brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 評價抑肽酶對缺血性腦水腫的抑制作用。

definition: to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
to stop at nothing (idiom)/to dare to do anything
